arm_group.description: patients requiring surgery for urethral stricture

brief_summary.textblock:
The analysis of the long-term outcomes and quality-of-life parameters after urethral
      reconstruction surgery.

clinical_study.brief_title: Functional Outcome of Urethral Reconstructive Surgery

detailed_description.textblock:
Urethroplasty is the surgical repair of a urethral stricture. Depending on the location,
      severity and length of the stricture, various techniques can be performed.

      The first procedure consists of the excision of the stenotic segment and end-to-end
      anastomosis. Other procedures consist of widening the urethra with buccal mucosa as free
      graft or with vascularized (genital) skin flaps. The results of these techniques have been
      described in prospective cohort studies, but to date there is little good data about the
      functional outcome and quality-of-life with longer follow-up after this surgery.

      The purpose of this study is to prospectively follow patients for functional outcome
      parameters  and quality-of-life to obtain long-term information concerning these surgeries.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  male

          -  urethral stricture surgery

          -  informed consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

        - /

study_pop.textblock: All patients who underwent urethral reconstruction in our center from 2009 to this date

clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Long-term Single Center Cohort Study Assessing Functional Outcome of Urethral Reconstructive Surgery

primary_outcome.description:
Validated questionnaires (patient reported outcome measures) concerning general discomfort, micturition problems, erections, and the impact of those problems on their social life.
International Prostate Symptom Score - Quality of Life questionnair (IPSS-QOL)
International Consultation of Incontinence - Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms Quality of Life questionnair (ICIQ-LUTSQoL)
primary_outcome.measure: Quality Of Life: change from baseline (=preoperative value)

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description:
Validated questionnaires
International Consultation of Incontinence - Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms Quality of Life questionnair (ICIQ-LUTSQoL)
Urogenital Distress Inventory short form (UDI-6)
secondary_outcome.measure: Functional outcomes: micturition: change from baseline (=preoperative value)

secondary_outcome.description:
Validated questionnaires
* International Index of Erectile Dysfunction (IIEF)
secondary_outcome.measure: Functional outcomes: erection: change from baseline (=preoperative value)

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
